summary:
Samsung Galaxy is a popular line of phones, tablets, laptops, smartwatches, and earbuds made by Samsung. It started in 2009 with the Galaxy S, and now includes many series like the S, Z, A, and M lines. These devices use Android software with Samsung's own user interface called One UI.

The Galaxy brand also expanded to include laptops (Galaxy Book), smartwatches (Galaxy Watch), and wireless earbuds (Galaxy Buds). Samsung even made a Chrome OS laptop, the Galaxy Chromebook. The Galaxy Note series, known for its large screens and stylus, is now discontinued.
title: Samsung Galaxy
